properties.name: camel.security.undertow.keycloak
properties.description: Properties defined for keycloak provider. Value is gathered together from properties with prefix "camel.component.undertow.spring.security.keycloak"

properties.name: camel.security.undertow.keycloak.client-id
properties.description: Client id from the Keycloak server used for authentication.

properties.name: camel.security.undertow.keycloak.realm-id
properties.description: Realm id from the keycloak server used for authentication.

properties.name: camel.security.undertow.keycloak.url
properties.description: Url to keycloak server which will be used in spring security configuration. (Example "http://localhost:8080")

properties.name: camel.security.undertow.keycloak.user-name-attribute
properties.description: Name of the attribute, which will be used as username.
